scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.releaseBackend: cd backend && npm run release && cd ..
scripts.releaseFrontend: cd frontend && npm run release && cd ..
scripts.release-subprojects: npm run releaseBackend && npm run releaseFrontend
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run release-subprojects && gulp release
